thread.title: March Madness Is Here, and Warren Buffett Knows I’m an Idiot

author: Jason Gay
title: March Madness Is Here, and Warren Buffett Knows I’m an Idiot
text:
March Madness is here, and save yourself the trouble: Instead of joining the office pool, simply wander into the break room and set fire to a pile of cash in the kitchen sink.
See, I saved you all that anxiety. You’re feeling better already. And you didn’t have to watch Duke. Or find truTV with the remote.
Am I grumpy that Wisconsin isn’t...
